verses.verse: Little Children <S%G5040><s%> My, <S%G3450><s%> These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Ye May Not Sin; <S%G264><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Sin, <S%G264><s%> A Paraclete <S%G3875><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> With <S%G4314><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> The Righteous; <S%G1342><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> We Have Known <S%G1097><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> We Keep. <S%G5083><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%>, Says, <S%G3004><s%> I Have Known <S%G1097><s%>, Him, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1785><s%> His Commandments <S%G846><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Is Not Keeping, <S%G5083><s%> A Liar <S%G5583><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G5129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not; <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G3739><s%> ' <S%G1161><s%> But Whoever <S%G302><s%> May Keep <S%G5083><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Word, <S%G3056><s%> Truly <S%G230><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G5129><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Has Been Perfected. <S%G5048><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> This <S%G5129><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> We Are. <S%G2070><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him He <S%G846><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> Ought, <S%G3784><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> He <S%G1565><s%> Walked, <S%G4043><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> So <S%G3779><s%> To Walk. <S%G4043><s%>

Brethren, <S%G80><s%> Not A 3756 PRT-N Commandment 1785 N-ASF New 2537 A-ASF I Write 1125 V-PAI-1S To You, 5213 P-2DP ' But 235 CONJ Commandment 1785 N-ASF An Old, 3820 A-ASF Which 3739 R-ASF Ye Had 2192 V-IAI-2P ' From The 575 PREP Beginning : 746 N-GSF The 3588 T-NSF Commandment 1785 N-NSF 3588 T-NSF Old 3820 A-NSF Is 2076 V-PXI-3S The 3588 T-NSM Word 3056 N-NSM Which 3739 R-ASM Ye Heard 191 V-AAI-2P ' From The 575 PREP Beginning. 746 N-GSF

Again <S%G3825><s%> A Commandment <S%G1785><s%> New <S%G2537><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> True <S%G227><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You, <S%G5213><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Is Passing Away, <S%G3855><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> <S%G3588><s%> True <S%G228><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> Shines. <S%G5316><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Says <S%G3004><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light He <S%G5457><s%> Is, <S%G1511><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother <S%G846><s%> Hates, <S%G3404><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Now. <S%G737><s%>

He That <S%G3588><s%> Loves <S%G25><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Cause Of Offence <S%G4625><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> <S%G3756><s%> There Is Not. <S%G2076><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Hates <S%G3404><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G80><s%> His Brother, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Walks, <S%G4043><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Knows Not <S%G1492><s%> Where <S%G4225><s%> He Goes, <S%G5217><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Darkness <S%G4653><s%> Blinded <S%G5186><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3788><s%> His Eyes. <S%G846><s%>

I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Have Been Forgiven <S%G863><s%> You Your <S%G5213><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sins <S%G266><s%> For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> His Name. <S%G846><s%>

I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Known <S%G1097><s%> Him Who Is <S%G3588><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> The Beginning. <S%G746><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Young Men, <S%G3495><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Overcome <S%G3528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One. <S%G4190><s%> I Write <S%G1125><s%>, To You, <S%G5213><s%> Little Children, <S%G3813><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Known <S%G1097><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father. <S%G3962><s%>

I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Fathers, <S%G3962><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Have Known <S%G1097><s%> Him Who Is <S%G3588><s%> ' From The <S%G575><s%> Beginning. <S%G746><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> Young Men, <S%G3495><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Strong <S%G2478><s%> Ye Are <S%G2075><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Have Overcome <S%G3528><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wicked One. <S%G4190><s%>

<S%G3361><s%> Love Not <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> Nor <S%G3366><s%> The Things <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World. <S%G2889><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Love <S%G25><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Love <S%G26><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> That Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World, <S%G2889><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flesh, <S%G4561><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Desire <S%G1939><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Eyes, <S%G3788><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Vaunting <S%G212><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Life, <S%G979><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> Is Passing Away, <S%G3855><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lust <S%G1939><s%> Of It, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> But He That <S%G1161><s%> Does <S%G4160><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Will <S%G2307><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> Abides <S%G3306><s%> For <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Ever. <S%G165><s%>

Little Children, The <S%G3813><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> It Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> According As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Antichrist <S%G500><s%> Is Coming, <S%G2064><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Now <S%G3568><s%> Antichrists <S%G500><s%> Many <S%G4183><s%> Have Arisen, <S%G1096><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> We Know <S%G1097><s%> That The <S%G3754><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> Hour <S%G5610><s%> It Is. <S%G2076><s%>

From Among <S%G1537><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%>, They Went Out, <S%G1831><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Us; <S%G2257><s%> <S%G1487><s%> For It <S%G1063><s%> They Were <S%G2258><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> Would Have Remained <S%G3306><s%> They <S%G302><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Us, <S%G2257><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Might Be Made Manifest <S%G5319><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Are Not <S%G1526><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Us. <S%G2257><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye The <S%G5210><s%> Anointing <S%G5545><s%> Have <S%G2192><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Holy One, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%>

<S%G3756><s%> I Wrote Not <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Ye Know Not <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth, <S%G225><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Any <S%G3956><s%> Lie <S%G5579><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Truth <S%G225><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

Who <S%G5101><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Liar <S%G5583><s%> <S%G1487><s%> But <S%G3361><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Denies <S%G720><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ? <S%G5547><s%> He <S%G3778><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Antichrist <S%G500><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Denies <S%G720><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son. <S%G5207><s%>
Everyone <S%G3956><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Denies <S%G720><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son, <S%G5207><s%> Neither <S%G3761><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Has He. <S%G2192><s%>

Ye <S%G5210><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> Ye Heard <S%G191><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> The Beginning, <S%G746><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Let It Abide : <S%G3306><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Should Abide <S%G3306><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> The Beginning <S%G746><s%> Ye Heard, <S%G191><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Shall Abide. <S%G3306><s%>
These Things <S%G5023><s%> I Wrote <S%G1125><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Those Who <S%G3588><s%> Lead Astray <S%G4105><s%> You : <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> You <S%G5210><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Anointing <S%G5545><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Received <S%G2983><s%> ' From <S%G575><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Abides, <S%G3306><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> Ye Have <S%G2192><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Anyone <S%G5100><s%> Should Teach <S%G1321><s%> You; <S%G5209><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> Anointing <S%G5545><s%> Teaches <S%G1321><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All Things. <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Is Not <S%G2076><s%> A Lie; <S%G5579><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> It Taught <S%G1321><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> Ye Shall Abide <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Now, <S%G3568><s%> Little Children, <S%G5040><s%> Abide <S%G3306><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> He Be Manifested <S%G5319><s%> Ye May Have <S%G2192><s%> Boldness, <S%G3954><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Be Put To Shame <S%G153><s%> ' <S%G575><s%> From Before Him <S%G846><s%> At <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3952><s%> His Coming. <S%G846><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Righteous <S%G1342><s%> He Is, <S%G2076><s%> Ye Know <S%G1097><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Everyone <S%G3956><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Practises <S%G4160><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Righteousness <S%G1343><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Has Been Begotten. <S%G1080><s%>
